sentence.Network_en: The solvent sublation technique is a new separation - concentration method.
sentence.Network_cn: 溶剂浮选法是近年来出现的一种新型分离富集方法.

sentence.Network_en: Ecological civilization is the critique and sublation of various kinds of civilization in human history.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要生态文明是对以往诸文明形态的批判与扬弃.

sentence.Network_en: The process of sublation is just, as Marx said, the process of human history.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个自身扬弃过程也就是马克思说的“自然历史过程”.
